text: garaz jab moosa ne chaaha ki us shakhs par jo donon ka dushman tha (chhudaane ke lie) haath badhaen to qibtee kahane laga ki ai moosa jis tarah tumane kal ek aadamee ko maar daala (usee tarah) mujhe bhee maar daalana chaahate ho to tum bas ye chaahate ho ki rue zameen mein sarakash ban kar raho aur masalah (qaum) banakar rahana nahin chaahate
